description.para: Implementation for handling AreaDamageEvents Pass them on to the AreaDamageComponent Calling of the events that are the same in TriggerEvents will come from AreaDamageTriggerBase

detaileddescription.para: Called when a trigger is created

briefdescription.para: Called when a trigger is destroyed.
Called when an object enters the trigger.
Called at the beginning of an update loop.
Called at the end of an update loop.
Called when an object leaves the trigger.
Tell the AreaDamageComponent to calculate and apply the damage to the Object.
Helper for calculating damageCoeff when using OnEvaluateDamageEx.
Get the world position of the Effect.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use GetCurrent variant
vector The world position of the Effect

detaileddescription.para: create damage trigger with basic set of params
